nodes.text: During the Clone Wars, this IG-86 sentinel droid was owned by Trandoshan scavenger Gha Nachkt along with two others. It was stationed aboard the Vulture's Claw. At one point, a droid that escaped its small prison on the ship after being captured was spotted by the sentinel droid, resulting in a short chase. R2-D2 lured the sentinel into the airlock, where the droid was soon trapped and jettisoned off the ship.
